channel.title: Services on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Musings about ENUMplus and ISNs
item.description: Recently I’ve been playing around with a couple of technologies that I haven’t used in quite a while; ENUM and ISN. First, a little information on what these technologies are about. ISNs and ITADs First, lets talk about ISN (ITAD Subscriber Number) and ITAD (Internet Telephony Administrative Domain). I think the http://www.freenum.org website does a good job of succinctly describing the problem attempting to be addressed: “The Freenum/ISN system is 12-digit-keypad (telephone handset) friendly method of providing mapping between users.
